wizard-navigation.confirm: Do you want to abandon the creation of the checking account?

form-step.title: Create your OpenClose Checking Account
form-step.paragraph-1:
First, you must create a different password for your electronic belongings.
 You will not be able to recover your password, so remember it well.
form-step.paragraph-2: You can also create a hint to help you remember your master password.

hint-password.label: Create your hint to remember your password (optional)
